description:
Kibito Kaioushin is a result of Potara Fusion between http://anidb.net/ch67299 [Kaioushin] and his servant http://anidb.net/ch67300 [Kibito]. His personality is for the most part similar to the Kaioushin`s, except the unusual amount of concern he had for the damage the fight with http://anidb.net/ch41758 [Buu] was doing to his planet.
Source: Dragon Ball Wikia
name: Kibito Kaioushin
